title: A Memoir: Healing Childhood Emotional Wounds, An Adult's Journey to God's Love
description: Our childhood emotional wounds mold us into the wounded adults we become.We cannot embrace the present and move into our future if we are living in the past. We can never step into the fullness of our calling if we are controlled by the lies we believed as truth.Lifeâ€™s events molded him into the wounded adult he became from his childhood emotional wounds.Follow the spiraling path that led to near disaster.Journey with Bruce down a road to healing.
author: Bruce Brodowski
